Author: realschmeal
Text: Do you meal prep?   I found that by calculating out my week's worth of calories and knowing what I'm going to eat everyday helps ease my mind during the week. I usually dedicate every Sunday to finding new recipes that fit my needs as well as cooking and preparing.   I also have mental fixations and need to keep track of e v e r y t h i n g I eat, and have found meal prepping helps a lot.  Thank you for sharing your story!
